OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD HOMES ESTATE AND ENVIRONMENTAL TEAM

Desc.entry: A scheme to improve the environs and upkeep of Park Hill, Arbourthorne, Heeley etc by the removal of rubbish and graffiti.

ContactName.entry: Richard Crann, Housing Co-ordinator/Colin Anderson, Senior Housing Officer/Andy Gallagher, Housing Officer

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: No public access, please contact by telephone, fax or email.
